variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_An
variableDataArray.meaning: SG exponential term for electrons at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_An_expo
variableDataArray.meaning: SG exponent for electrons at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Ap
variableDataArray.meaning: SG exponential term for holes at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Ap_expo
variableDataArray.meaning: SG exponent for holes at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Dn
variableDataArray.meaning: SG diffusive term for electrons at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Dn_th
variableDataArray.formula:
# semi.bc_Qn: Electron non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient
# semi.bc_Dn: SG diffusive term for electrons at the boundaries

semi.bc_Qn - 1.5 * semi.bc_Dn

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Dp
variableDataArray.meaning: SG diffusive term for holes at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_half_etaeff_n
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order 1/2, eta n

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_half_etaeff_p
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order 1/2, eta p

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_minushalf_eta_n
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order -1/2, eta n

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_minushalf_eta_p
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order -1/2, eta p

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_one_etaeff_n
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order 1, eta n

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_one_etaeff_p
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order 1, eta p

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_zero_etaeff_n
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order 0, eta n

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_FD_zero_etaeff_p
variableDataArray.meaning: Fermi-Dirac integral of order 0, eta p

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Qn
variableDataArray.meaning: Electron non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Qp
variableDataArray.meaning: Hole non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Qthn
variableDataArray.meaning: Electron non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Qthp
variableDataArray.meaning: Hole non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Vn
variableDataArray.meaning: SG convective term for electrons at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.bc_Vp
variableDataArray.meaning: SG convective term for holes at the boundaries

variableDataArray.name: semi.dcnN
variableDataArray.meaning: Local exterior boundary distance at domain edge, (numerical)

variableDataArray.name: semi.dcnP
variableDataArray.meaning: Local exterior boundary distance at domain edge, (numerical)

variableDataArray.name: semi.n_bnd
variableDataArray.formula:
if abs(semi.bc_An_expo) < semi.global_flux_tol_sg:
    semi.n_bnd = semi.JtnC * semi.dc_n/(e_const*semi.bc_Dn) + semi.N
else:
    semi.n_bnd = semi.JtnSG * ( 1 - semi.bc_An ) /(e_const * semi.bc_Vn) + semi.N *semi.bc_An

variableDataArray.name: semi.nD
variableDataArray.meaning: Normal component of the electric displacement field

variableDataArray.name: semi.nJ
variableDataArray.formula:
#semi.nJn: Outward normal electron current density
#semi.nJp: Outward normal hole current density

semi.nJn + semi.nJp

variableDataArray.name: semi.p_bnd
variableDataArray.formula:
if abs(semi.bc_Ap_expo) < semi.global_flux_tol_sg:
    semi.p_bnd = -semi.JtpC * semi.dc_n/(e_const*semi.bc_Dp) + semi.P
else:
    semi.p_bnd = semi.JtpSG * (1 - semi.bc_Ap)/(e_const * semi.bc_Vp) + semi.P * semi.bc_Ap)
